name: SaaS Subscription
description: Recurring-access software or analytics platform with tiered pricing.

name: Freemium Conversion
description: Offer a free basic version and convert premium users through added features.

name: Marketplace Platform
description: Connect buyers and sellers through a digital marketplace earning commissions.

name: Data-as-a-Service
description: Aggregate, enrich, and sell datasets or insights via subscription or API.

name: API Monetization
description: Expose core functionality through APIs and charge per call or tier.

name: Hardware-as-a-Service
description: Offer physical equipment bundled with monitoring and recurring service fees.

name: Product Leasing
description: Lease equipment or assets instead of selling outright.

name: Usage-Based Billing
description: Charge customers per unit consumed (e.g., kWh, hour, transaction).

name: Franchise Expansion
description: Replicate a proven model through franchisees under a unified brand.

name: Technology Licensing
description: License intellectual property to manufacturers or integrators.

name: Consulting-to-Product Ladder
description: Start with bespoke services and evolve to a repeatable product.

name: Managed Services
description: Operate and maintain client infrastructure for a monthly fee.

name: Pay-per-Outcome
description: Charge customers only when measurable results are achieved.

name: Crowdsourcing Platform
description: Leverage community input or labor for innovation or microtasks.

name: Ecosystem Orchestrator
description: Provide core infrastructure allowing partners to co-create value.

name: Circular Economy
description: Design for reuse, refurbishment, and recycling to capture residual value.

name: Carbon Credit Generator
description: Earn or sell verified carbon offsets through sustainability projects.

name: Community Enterprise
description: Locally owned venture reinvesting profits into community development.

name: Hybrid Grant-to-Market
description: Combine early research grants with later-stage revenue sharing.

name: Subscription Box / Kit
description: Deliver curated products on a recurring subscription basis.

name: White-Label Manufacturing
description: Produce goods for other brands to repackage and sell.

name: Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM)
description: Integrate products into other manufacturersâ€™ systems.

name: Aftermarket Services
description: Offer maintenance, upgrades, and consumables post-sale.

name: Open-Source Core
description: Free core offering, monetized through premium add-ons and support.

name: Platform-as-a-Service
description: Provide development and deployment infrastructure as a service.

name: Product-Led Growth
description: Drive adoption through self-service product experience before sales.

name: Open Innovation Network
description: Collaborate across partners and startups for shared R&D outcomes.

name: Spin-out Venture
description: Form a new company to commercialize internal research results.

name: Technology Transfer Office Model
description: License, incubate, and spin out institutional research IP.

name: Incubator / Accelerator
description: Support multiple startups in exchange for equity or fees.

name: AI-as-a-Service
description: Offer AI or machine-learning models via subscription or API access.

name: Digital Twin Solutions
description: Create virtual replicas of assets or processes sold as a monitoring or optimization service.

name: Blockchain Tokenization
description: Use blockchain tokens to represent ownership or usage rights for assets or services.

name: Decentralized Marketplace
description: Peer-to-peer exchange of goods or services using smart contracts.

name: Tokenized Impact Credits
description: Issue tradeable tokens linked to verified impact outcomes (carbon, social, or biodiversity).

name: Energy-as-a-Service
description: Provide energy infrastructure, operation, and optimization with pay-per-use billing.

name: ESCO (Energy Service Company)
description: Finance and implement efficiency projects, repaid from cost savings.

name: BOOT / PPP Concession
description: Build-Own-Operate-Transfer model for infrastructure with long-term returns.

name: Blended Finance Platform
description: Combine grants, equity, and loans to de-risk early-stage innovation.

name: Green Bond / Climate Fund
description: Raise sustainability-linked finance instruments for project portfolios.

name: Impact-Linked Loan
description: Loan with interest rates that decrease when social or environmental targets are met.

name: Circular Supply Chain
description: Use materials-back loops where suppliers recover or refurbish used goods.

name: Re-commerce / Second-Life Market
description: Refurbish, remanufacture, and resell returned or used products.

name: Digital Manufacturing Network
description: Cloud-connected production network offering on-demand fabrication.

name: Additive Manufacturing Services
description: 3D-printing components for clients using digital inventory and design files.

name: Servitization
description: Shift from selling equipment to selling uptime or outcomes (e.g., power-by-the-hour).

name: Digital Subscription Community
description: Members pay recurring fees for access to expert content, tools, or support.

name: Creator Economy Platform
description: Enable creators to monetize audience engagement or digital assets.

name: Crowdfunding Equity Model
description: Raise small investments from many individuals in exchange for equity or perks.

name: Pay-What-You-Want
description: Let customers decide price, building loyalty and data for upselling.

name: Dynamic Pricing Engine
description: Adjust pricing automatically using demand, time, or AI predictions.

name: Ecosystem Membership
description: Charge annual membership for integrated ecosystem benefits and resources.

name: Digital Twin Maintenance Contracts
description: Bundle physical product sales with digital monitoring service contracts.

name: Usage-Based Insurance
description: Premiums dynamically adjusted based on monitored usage data.

name: Outcome-Based Healthcare
description: Payments tied to treatment results or patient recovery outcomes.

name: Social Enterprise Hybrid
description: Combine profit motives with social impact goals and reinvestment.

name: Gamified Engagement
description: Use points, rewards, or challenges to increase customer retention.

name: AI-Generated Content Service
description: Provide automated writing, design, or video creation as a service.

name: Micro-franchise Network
description: Create distributed small-scale franchises with shared branding and tools.

name: Subscription Repair & Maintenance
description: Offer ongoing maintenance plans for consumer or industrial goods.

name: Predictive Analytics-as-a-Service
description: Sell predictive insights using proprietary AI models or datasets.

name: Digital-Physical Hybrid Retail
description: Integrate e-commerce with immersive physical experiences or AR try-ons.

name: Tokenized Loyalty Program
description: Reward customers with tradeable digital tokens redeemable across partners.

name: AI-Driven Personalization
description: Offer hyper-personalized products or content recommendations using AI.

name: Virtual Experience Economy
description: Monetize immersive VR/AR experiences for education or entertainment.

name: Knowledge Marketplace
description: Enable experts to monetize their insights and micro-consulting sessions.

name: Platform Cooperative
description: Community-owned digital platform sharing value among contributors.

name: AI-Assisted Research Lab
description: Provide automated research, simulation, and experiment-as-a-service tools.

name: Intellectual Property Marketplace
description: Match IP holders with licensees through verified digital transactions.

name: Ecosystem Data Cooperative
description: Aggregate and monetize anonymized data shared by ecosystem members.
